name: DivoomPixoo-64
0:
”Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four to power on”
”Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four to increase the brightness”
”Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four to display the bitcoin clock”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pixoo sixty four
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Pixoo-64 is a WiFi pixel art display with a 64x64 LED panel. This is a unique lighting decoration with a mobile companion APP, where you can DIY and display your favorite pixel art animation. Pixoo-64 can also display the online social media information counter, where it will automatically fetch the selected information, such as: YouTube channel followers, Twitch stream views, Game KDA stats and more...

With the Amazon Alexa, you can command your Pixoo-64 by asking Alexa with the following questions:

Required: Pixoo-64 with WiFi network connected.

Screen control：
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four open screen
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four turn up
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four to wake up 
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four close screen
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four turn off the screen
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four turn off the panel

Adjust the brightness：
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four increase the brightness
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four brightness increase
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four light up
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four lower the brightness
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four decrease the brightness
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four dim the light
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four the light is too bright

Switch clock:
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four display Overwatch clock
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four open Overwatch clock
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four Show the  Bitcoin price
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four Show the  Bitcoin clocks
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four Show a different message board
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four Show the  USA stock
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four how many days away from Christmas
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four how many days away from Valentine's Day

Display picture:
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four display a dog
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four display a cat
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four display mario
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four display car
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four display bird
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four display city
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four display cow
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four display tree
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four display bridge

Play Recommended Animation:
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four to play recommended gallery
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four to Play popular gallery
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four to Play something cool
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four to show some animations
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four to show the HOT channe
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four to Play something fun

Play Favorite Animation:
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four to play my favorite pic
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four to play my favorite gif
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four switch to my favorites
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four to play my favorite

Play Subscription Animation:
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four to play subscription pic
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four to Play something I liked
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four to Show something I liked
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four to play my followed artists gallery
Alexa, ask pixoo sixty four to show my followed artists gallery
